headline: JPMorgan, BofA Leaders Subpoenaed by US Lawmakers Over CATL IPO
summary: (Bloomberg) -- JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Bank of America Corp. were subpoenaed by US lawmakers over their role in the initial public offering of Chinese battery maker Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. headline: Bank of America Increases Common Stock Dividend 8% to $0.28 Per Share, Authorizes $40 Billion Stock Repurchase Program
summary: Bank of America Corporation today announced the Board of Directors declared a regular quarterly cash dividend on Bank of America common stock of $0.28 per share, up $0.02 from the prior quarter. The dividend is payable on September 26, 2025 to shareholders of record as of September 5, 2025.

headline: Jim Cramer on Bank of America: “I Can’t Get Excited About It”
summary: Bank of America Corporation (NYSE:BAC) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer reflected on. While discussing the firm’s earnings report, Cramer noted that it posted the weakest earnings among the major banks. “Bank of America reported a good quarter, but it was the weakest of the four majors. headline: BoC likely to hold again at 2.75% as inflation persists, BofA says
summary: Investing.com -- Bank of America (NYSE:BAC) expects the Bank of Canada to hold its key policy rate at 2.75% on July 30, pointing to persistent core inflation and June’s unexpectedly strong labor market as reasons for caution. The firm sees no shift in forward guidance, with policymakers likely to maintain a “wait and see” posture amid ongoing economic uncertainty.
